bio.short: Masashi Terui is Architect and Developer at Serverworks Co., Ltd. and Freerancer on the side
bio.long: Masashi Terui is Architect and Developer at Serverworks Co., Ltd. and Freerancer on the side. He's called Serverless-Ojisan (means Mr. Serverless in english) in his company, and the author of Serverless Alexa Skills Plugin
